__e: Lorenzo came to me with a whole long story.
She keeps repeating that damn word to me every second, Lorenzo, and I want my son to be a real man.
Look, I don't see Lorenzo and his boys, so it look like you safe to go home now.
One leg of Rossi's leathers is yellow, one leg of Lorenzo's, red.
Well, as much as I enjoy protecting San Lorenzo from the many fiends who would steal its treasure...
That's what Lorenzo requires of me. (She hums a gentle tune) Why did you destroy your guns?
